content.detailedDescription: My sister first noticed the light while sitting out on our back deck as it was getting dark and the stars were becoming noticeable. she said that's too bright to be a star. it was first noticed in the east, over lake winnipesaukee, at quite a distance. i thought at first it was a star but it really was too bright to be a star and we could just barely notice colors flashing, white, red and green. we also thought it might be a plane, but it did not move like a plane. went back out on deck about an hour later, around 9:00 pm, it had moved to a ne position over lake winnipesaukee. watched the 'light' flashing colors, moving very erratically, side to side, up and down, diagonally, in circles. checked back a few more times, still was there. when i went out to check at 11:00 pm it had disappeared. this happened for 2 consecutive nights, beginning sept. 27, 2014 and also sept. 28, 2014. i will check again tonight and report if it is still showing up. we both believe it was a ufo.
content.summary: Flashing lights, moved erratically, up, down, diagonal, but stayed in same area.

content.detailedDescription: I was having a camp fire with my family in williamson, ny. my brother in law first noticed an extremely bright white light through the trees 100 yds away east of us. the light was blinding and we could not make out the shape. when we first noticed it we thought maybe it was a helicopter search light but there was no sound and the object moved in ways i have never seen. the object started from behind the trees then moved out into a clearing before excellerating at great speed up in the air and out of view.It started northeast in the tree line slowly moved south as it came out of the trees then shot up and away in the east. we were dumb founded and could not believe what we saw. we lost sight of the object after it climbed so much altitude it was no longer visible.
content.summary: Extremely bright light was close then sped away

content.detailedDescription: We took advantage of a great opportunity and were able to use our aunt’s beautiful cabin in drake colorado, its way up on the mountains between loveland and estes park.  on sunday morning, as the orion constellation was just getting into full swing in the southeast sky at or around 2:00-2:30 am, we noticed something. i had my iphone with the pocket universe app, so i can hold up the phone in the sky at night and go over the constellations with my kids. if you don’t know all the constellations, this is a real handy app and if you do, well then, you are a real geek. anyway, as was panning around with my phone, i stopped and notice something in the northwest  sky that caught my eye. it appeared to be two bright stars and i then asked my buddy what constellation they were a part of as i didn’t remember seeing them earlier. that’s when he said, they aren’t stars…they are moving! i shut off the phone and we just stared in amazement as these 2 white lights moved slowing through the northern sky. as they continued to move in a pattern (as if they were surveying  the area) one seemed to slow down and the other got to a place and stopped. the light went dimmer and dimmer (bubbling like) then just vanished. a short time later, the other did the same. there was also no sound during the whole event. i’ve been looking up the sky all my life and this is a first time i feel confident, we were seeing something that wasn’t from earth.
content.summary: Both were bright starlight like - moving in a straight pattern through sky

content.detailedDescription:
Please read this even though i don't have a picture or video of the object.  

i'll explain why.  

     i live out in the country near terrell, tx.  i took the dogs outside to do their business.  i was standing in the driveway and was looking at the night sky.  i noticed one particular star in the northeastern sky which was white, but then a flash of red and then blue could be seen.  i stared at this star for a while, and then i saw it move.  so i kept watching it to see if it was an airplane, or something.  it moved to the right, then quickly to the left.  it did this a few times, then it ascended a little higher, and then dropped down to its original position.  it just kept hovering.  
     i thought, "what is going on?  what is that?"  
personally, i do not believe that little green men are visiting planet earth, but i do feel that the government is keeping secrets from us.  

back to the story:  
     the object appeared to be too far away to get a picture or video.  aside from that, i have no video capabilities or camera.  i live in the country, so it is dark, except for farm lights.  the object's distance from me is unknown, so i cannot calculate the nearest city or county.  i can only furnish my own city and county from my viewpoint.     
     after observing it for awhile i took the dogs inside and finished watching television with my wife.  
     around 10:20 pm. that same evening i took the dogs out for their final time for the night.  i noticed that the object was still there in the same place.  i went into the house and said to my wife, "come outside with me.  i want to show you something."  we went outside and i said, "look at that star.  let me know if you see it move.  i don't know if i'm seeing things or if its really moving?"  we both stood there, and then it happened again.  it started moving like i described above.  she saw it move too.  we didn't stay outside very long.  she was tired and had to get up early in the morning to go to work.  we went into the house and went to bed.  
     personally,  i feel that the government has built some sort of aircraft with new technology and someone was test flying it.  i am curious, and don't know how much longer these test flights will be going on.  if this presents some interest, quick response is probably needed because this has been occurring for several nights in a row now.  the latest was last night. each night it does the same thing.  it was not just a one night occurrence.  this is why i believe they are doing tests with the aircraft.  i do have details for the nights of sept. 25, 26, & 28.  i really would like to know what this thing is.  with your time, experience and equipment, i feel, this incident can be solved.
content.summary: Night sky, ne direction, size of star, color was white with flickering red and blue colors.  object hovered, moved left, right, up, and down.

content.detailedDescription:
Hi there, 

at this evening i make photos from mars with my sony dsc 60 with a one second open blend. i make this photos with my sony and had a binoculars in front of my cam with an stativ to make better photos. the next day i put the photos on my computer, i was a little bit scared, cause three pics, two pics empty, one pic with this object. at first when i look at this photo, i thought it was dust or other. but when scrolled in, i was really scared. there you can see absolutely an flying object, with i think, a really hot beam at the backside of it. when you scroll more and more inside, at this object, you can see, that this thing isnt it a comet, meteor or anything else. i have send this picture in 2011 to 3 observatorys in germany, in nürnberg, münchen and augsburg. but no response come back. and i dont want to talk about my friends or anything else, you know why :) today, i see an documentation in n 24 in german tv about marc´d antonio. this gaves me new bravery and for take a report to him. 

the pics i send you, are the original pics. i only do copy them from my old hd to a newer one, thats all. 

i hope instandly that you can say what these thing a really is. cause, the way, this objects are flight in this 10 maybe 20 seconds are so big, that this never can be a natural phänomen or other i think.

much greetings from germany send you francis gericke
content.summary: 2 pics with 1 second blend open. at the second pic i see that thing

content.detailedDescription: An ufo is found on sky while i was walking to my house on 28/08/2014 at 17:30. i took my camera and clicked 6 photos of it. it was moving in very high speed and there was no sound as in the case of aircraft. an enlarged view of a photo shows a disk like structure. at last it entered into a cloud. video is at [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Ufo sighting at india on 28/08/2014 17:30

content.detailedDescription: I walked out on my back deck to let the dogs out and was watching the stars like i usually do. it was a very clear night.  i was trying to figure out the constellations and noticed a star (or i thought it was a star) that seemed to be moving. i watched it for a bit and it was definitely moving.  it was a far, far distance like a star would be from earth. about the same size spec as maybe a star in orions belt. but it was definitely moving in a straight line slightly sw to slightly ne.  i had to move to the corner of my house to keep watching it go. i witnessed it basically from horizon to horizon which it covered in under 30 seconds.  as it was beginning to get farther away i noticed it sorta wobbled side to side a little, kinda like a plane would hit turbulence and maybe veer off course slightly then regain the path.  now just fyi, im directly in the flight path of philly int airport and its common to see planes fly over every 45 seconds to a minute or so apart on various approaches or flying in other directions such as newark.  i know this was not a plane.  it was a solid bright light no blinking or anything.  it was a spec in the sky so i know it was really far up and the distance it covered it had to be going quick.  that's it, not much else to say. maybe someone else noticed it.
content.summary: Bright star like light moving in fast straight line considering extreme distance.

content.detailedDescription: I was going out to my work truck to get something. it was a bright star filled sky and i looked up and saw 2 separate set of blinking lights , flying next to each other, moving very fast from the west to the east, faster than any plane that i have ever witnessed. it was totally calm out, not a cloud in the sky, the strange thing was that there was no sound.  by the time i got through the house and grabbed my wife to see this they were almost gone on the east.  we live in a field in the country, we can see a great portion of the sky. my son and i went back to the west side of the house where we observed upwards of 15 more pop up on the horizon heading in the same direction as the first 2.  the kicker that made this very unusual was as one was directly above us both of us saw what looked like any ordinary star that was stationary all of a sudden start moving very fast towards one of the craft and when it got close to it make a right angle turn like it bounced off of it, making a check mark in the sky then either disappeared or became stationary again blending into the stars.  there was no sound the entire time of any engines.  this is truly the strangest thing we have ever seen.
content.summary: 12+ silent craft moving very fast and another that was different from the others

content.detailedDescription: I was working the night shift at the twin tunnels and stopped for a second to take a cool picture of the tunnel and the mountain. someone else noticed the lights and pointed them out to us. myself and many others all watched as they slowly flew straight up into the clouds. it was overcast and a bit foggy so they had to be pretty close. i didn't realize until later that i had taken pictures of it.
content.summary: 3 lights that went straight up into the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I am on the north end in tacoma, so i am very used to commercial and military aircraft in our skies. we are right under the approach for mcchord and can hear & see seatac traffic all the time.
i also know a satellite's appearence when they reflect sunlight at very high altitudes.
at apprx 20.40 on 27se14 i noticed a light much brighter than normal aircraft and it was going much faster than anything we normally see. very bright red/orange glow with a bit of pulsating. it was traveling roughly ne to sw, and it was not in the normal commercial or military corridors.
this one light which caught our attention was followed by two in tandem.
i hoped on our roof, from where i have a very good view of tacoma, the port, brown's point and seatac, and the glow of seattle farther north. i could see commercial craft on approach like normal. 
a fourth light appeared and followed the same flight path at the same speed. now on the roof i had a better view of where these were coming from and it is possible to have taken off from boeing field gievn that direction and their climb in altitude. 
this was followed by a fifth, then a sixth.
all six lights were the same magnitude, brightness, color, speed, altitude, flight path etc. and they all went out at the same place in flight as it passed tacoma.

i am familiar with fast movers (fighter jets) the high speed, the bright glow and the fading out after it passed.
however, after burn comes with the very very loud jet engine sound; we heard nothing from these lights during the entire incident.
these lights seemed to travel directly over tacoma (se from where i observed) this is much closer than normal seatac traffic. we hear all seatac traffic, even the smaller horizon flights, however we heard nothing from these lights/craft.
icbm?
content.summary: 6 glowing orbs over tacoma

content.detailedDescription:
On knoxville rd near 148th ave. in milan, il.\

fellow passenger in car noticed it first coming in from the west. 

object was rust and gold color, glowing and making a considerable trail. moving very fast from west to east. object did not appear to be arching like a metoeor. the object slowed and the trail dissapted but the object continued on with a slight orange glow till it disappeared from view. 

i felt calm, so did one fellow passenger, the other 2 passengers being of younger age were slightly spooked from the object.
content.summary: Driving towards sherrard, fellow passenger notices object coming towards east from the west. as object travels towards us i pulled over to see object directly above us traveling in great speed with a golden trail. then object slowed  & continued on.

content.detailedDescription: Around 5.55 pm saturday i was returning to home from coaching classes. on my way to home i suddenly noticed a bright spherical object of size of a tennis ball . it was emitting bright blue lights like that of neon lights. it was about 24 to 175 ft above the ground. it covered about 500 metres in less than 0.5 seconds.  the object was flying over a drain and at moment i was in the bridge .The object suddenly disappeared above that drain . it couldn't have been a meteorite as it  did'nt leave tails .
content.summary: It was a bright tennis ball size object. it was at a height of approximately 50 to 170 ft above the ground . it covered approximately 500 metres in less than 0.5 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone (witness wishes to remain anonymous), he called this in to me and said that he would file a report in august but he never did so i'm entering the information for the record. if he does file his own report i'll note it on this one. phone number is my office line. 

"i work in law enforcement as a state trooper so don't want my real name used, but felt it was important to let someone know what i saw. i want you to know that i've never seen anything like this before and hope i never do again. i was driving north on range line road (49 hwy) on my routine path at approximately 5:12 a.M. on sept 2nd when a light caught my eye to the ne of my position low at the tree line. as i drove closer i slowed the vehicle because at first i thought that it must be a helicopter since whatever it was was so low that it couldn't be a plane. i then noticed that there was structure to the object and that it began to move slowly west towards the highway and closer to my vehicle. there were no other cars on the highway at that time. as it got closer and as i drove closer i noticed that the top portion of this teardrop or triangular shaped craft was elevated and that there were windows along the top portion. the windows were rectangular and placed vertically, and there were three that i could see from my position.There was a yellow/white glow coming from inside the windows. i did not see any people inside but did see movement - i assume it was the occupants moving around.The craft appeared to be at least 100'+ wide and 25' or so high. it was a dark dull grey/black metallic craft with lights on the bottom only. i saw no navigation lights. the bottom lights were an amber and a red/orange color of varying sizes but the odd thing was that there was no beam coming from any of the lights - they simply glowed. the size of the lights was from streetlight size to perhaps 24" in diameter. there was a low hum coming from the object which i only noticed on close approach at about 50'. i slowed down to a near stop when the object moved close to the highway and then spun around like a top and reversed direction. as it did so, i heard a loud static noise come from my radio for approximately 15 seconds. i did not call this in to report it because i wasn't sure what i was looking at and did not want to put my job in jeopardy in case it was a real ufo. the object then moved away slowly to the east until i could no longer see it. i realized that my vehicle was stopped on the highway although i remember thinking that i did not intend to stop. i looked at the clock and realized that i had been watching the object for 15 minutes. at that point, i saw a jet moving very fast from east to west, it banked to the north and went back east. it looked like a fighter jet that may have been looking for the object i saw. i could hear it clearly. i did not believe in ufos before this incident but i know what i saw and it was not something of ours - at least that is known to the public.
content.summary: Very large ufo with windows hovering close to trees

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen this before in early am hours.  always thought it was weird, decided to get some pictures which revealed more than noticed by eye.  looked like it was twinkling as atmospheric refraction (that's what i wrote it off as in prior sightings)  but when photographed with my 16mp sony dsc-wx50 it got real when i checked  the pictures.  also i notice in the pictures they are blurry which is not normal for my camera, which is known to take non blurry pictures, it has hdr feature although it wasn't on in these pictures. the object however looks more in focus than the trees and on one  of the pictures i noticed some camera malfunction with vertical line smearing on the bottom. the object appears to be a morphing object,  i have seen similar things on youtube videos. i will probably see it again, it is not unusual but it is intriguing and strange for sure. it was there for a long time probably at least an hour. i didn't just stay and stare at it,  but i didn't think i had these morphing shots when i took them.. i just realized that when checking the photos a couple days later.  i was thinking it was the "morning star" or something not ufo before seeing the pictures. you have to zoom in a bit to see the details of the "object" thanks for letting me share this. 
-david in independence mo near the weird church.
content.summary: Looked like maybe a planet but too weird and close to be.

content.detailedDescription:
On sept 22, 2010, i was out by the schuylkill river testing out my new canon rebel.  it was my first time taking night shots with a tripod.
  
i put the camera on timer and let it take 10 shots in a row. 
there was heat lightening going off in the clouds and i was hoping to get a shot of that in the clouds over boathouse row.
because these weren't taken with a flash, the shutter would open for a second or 2 before shutting and going to the next photo.  since the shutter was open rather long to let in the week amount of light, you see the head lights of the cars on boathouse row in a blur.  however, in this series of photos, there's an odd thing happening.  there's a set of three white lights evenly spaced and not in a blur.  with each shot they slowly progress from the left frame of the picture to the right with each successive shot.

the only time i notices the lights was after i uploaded the photos onto my computer. 

when i first saw these lights in the photos, i thought they had to be a plane of some sort.  but that didn't make sense because the shutter on the camera was staying open for several seconds on each shot.  anything moving objects turn into blurred motion in such low light.  these lights weren't like that.  

to tell you the truth, i'm not ruling out that these aren't something explainable.  i just haven't been able to find a reason (nor have anyone i know been able to).
content.summary: Three steady lights slowly moved over philadelphia's art museum neighborhood

content.detailedDescription: I live in the hollywood area of los angeles.  my apartment is within 100 feet of the walk of fame. on the night i witnessed this ufo i was in my apartment with some other friends of mine.  i went outside onto my balcony to smoke a cigarette when at aprox. 8:25pm i noticed a starlike, bright, white light in the nw sky. using my cell phone compass, i've approximated it to be at 310 degrees nw. it steadily headed in my direction with no sound and a constant to brightening white light. it continued in a curved path when i lost it over my own apartment roof when it was then heading 90 degrees east. the object was to bright to determine any structural details , just an orb shaped light. i started my recording about half way through my sighting, in total i viewed the object for no more than three minutes. my video is 1:21 minutes long. my feelings during and after the sighting were relatively calm. i've seen several ufo's on this same balcony, but this is the first i captured on my phone. but yet i was still slow to the punch in recording, i guess there is always that initial shock factor when you see something you know isn't quite normal.
content.summary: Standing on balcony saw an extremely bright light coming from the northwest flying east watched for about 1 min before taping

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
- we were taking a walk in a suburban neighborhood near our apartment, up cottage st. to "clark creek park" with our 4 year old & 7 month old daughters around 6:00 pm. it was twilight but still very light out.

2. what made you first notice the object?
- i don't know, i just looked up into the sky and saw the 1st one of the "balloon-like" clusters.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
- the objects looked like balloon clusters at first, descending down from the many wisps of clouds high overhead. then it became apparent that instead they were some "balloon-like" cluster ufos that we'd studied about before.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
- these were the infamous "balloon-like" clusters, as well as some single spheres that seemed to slowly move in paths. the 1st group had 3 separate sphere clusters, the 2nd group had 2 separate sphere clusters. some groups had a red sphere within a cluster of apparently white spheres. we've seen many photos, videos and have read about these "balloon-like" clusters before this event today. they would move along on
slowly and then seem to stay in the same area for awhile at times.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
- we had no strange feelings, just excitement. we've had different types of encounters numerous times, but have never witnessed these "balloon-like" clusters in person. we've also never gotten any photos or video of any other incidents before this.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
- we never really lost sight of the objects except when they eventually would rise above and beyond certain wisps of high clouds after awhile. we continued on to the public park.
content.summary: These were the infamous

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out back with both of my dogs smoking a cigarette at about 9:45 pm, when the ufo appered above a house behind mine. it hovered there for about 10-15 seconds. after that it vanished it didnt take off it, just well it was gone. i ran in the house to tell my mother about what i had saw, and i asked her if i was crazy i am 21 years old and she is 58. she told me no that when she was younger she had seen one to but never told anyone. when i ran inside i was almost in tears. the shape of it was diamond like in the front and triangular around. i never believed them in fact i always thought that people who talked about them were idiots and full of s**t. i now believe and feel differently about them.
content.summary: Saw the ufo above a house right out behind mine. it was a diamond shape with a few lights, i didnt zoom off it just vanished right in front of me

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was relaxing in a hammock listening to my phone (85% full at the time)
2. i heard a jet like noise (which is abnormal for our area)
3. i didn't know what it was
4. it was moving north and then abruptly to the west.
5. i was scared for my life.
6. the object went past the trees.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Ufo passes by power line grid

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were walking up to the gas station by our home and when we came outside we noticed this one orb thingy that looked as though it was on fire of sorts, i turned to my husband and said "what the heck is that, you see that right?"  he said yeah and look there is another one.  we watched whatever it was and they were orange and red in color and were moving without any sound at all!!  they seemed to be heading towards the bay and as we stood there watching them they blinked a couple times then faded out.  weird we never saw anything like this before.  there were also plenty of airplanes in the area too.  it was no plane also the next night i saw, along with my husband in the daytime 2 very strange looking white objects way up in the sky and they were flying too close to be airplanes, these were silverish white if that makes sense and heading east.
content.summary: 2 glowing orange balls first one then the other one appeared

content.detailedDescription:
I saw an object with halogen bright red, green and white lights
moving up and down in the sky over lake huron. 
i watched with binoculars and it appeared to be
snaking up and down in the sky. the sky tonight is very cloudy but
this object is clearly visible.
content.summary: Object with halogen bright red,green and white light over lake huron moving up and down in a cloudy sky at 9 pm,

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: All kinds

content.detailedDescription:
The observer was sitting outside on their balcony having a cigarette around 3:30am when a bright object appeared in the sky above them. they said the object was larger than an aircraft carrier and looked similar to a lego in that there were round lights/bumps that did not pulsate. originally the observer thought maybe it was a drone, a star or even the space station. then as the object became clearer they realised it was too big to be any of those things. the object was less than 10,000 ft high and was 3-5 miles southeast of newhall. 

the object hovered and went backwards. it then moved a little forward and then turned right.  it then moved straight again, backed up and then made a turn to the right and this is when the observer was able to see the front of the ufo. the front of the ship appeared to be completely sealed and rectangular like a cargo container with lights on the sides and below it. there were lights everywhere. the ufo advanced slowly and took a long time to make a pivot turn. the observer described the movements like a ship on the ocean. the observer thought that the ship detected the light from his cigarette as it approached their direction. quickly intrigue turned into fear and the observer went inside. the ufo was said to be completely silent and was about cloud level in regards to closeness to the observer.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo appeared to be bigger than an aircraft carrier and looked like a cargo container.

content.detailedDescription: My wife called me to come outside, she said she never saw anything like this before. i observed about six red lights off in the distance remaining mostly stationary but some would blink out only to be replaced by others at a different altitude. there was no trail like you would see with fireworks. the lights remained stationary as far as i could tell from that distance. the video is jumpy because i was at max zoom. i had a hard time keeping them in frame so i didn't shoot video the entire time they were visiable. some lights appeared just above the horizon. eventually, they all dimmed and disappeared.
content.summary: Multiple red lights blinking on and off

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was watching the 4th of july fire works in downtown memphis.

2. what made you first notice the object?

the silhouette of an object was hovering over fire works. (not pulsing yet)

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

a ufo.

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

i could see the object hovering with red and green lights pulsating from the bottom of it.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

excited with a bit of an eerie feeling.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?

the object slowly flew away.
over 500 witnesses
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Memphis resident films ufo during firework show at local park. ufo seemed to stick around for about 2 minutes. the ufo can be seen above the fireworks pulsating and changing colors.

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:45 pm i went outside on my deck facing south and saw 3 red glowing balls of what looked like fire heading from philadelphia north towards bucks county. they looked to be under airline cruising altitude as i am fairly close to phila and most planes are not at cruising altitude when they pass my house. they made no sound that i could detect. they were spaced apart by a second or two and continued so until they got to a point northeast of me where they just seemed to flutter out. at first i thought they were airplanes but i never saw an airplane glowing like this both coming towards me and away from me and never with that intensity. it was dark so i could not make out any form other than a round glowing orb. after i dismissed it as being airplanes i thought it might be a few meteors but no contrails were visible. i ran into my house to the front door so i could follow it going past my house and watched it for about 10 seconds until they disappeared in a flutter well before an airplane would have faded out. i saw two airplanes in the area north of me who must have also seen it to the east of them.
content.summary: Witnessed 3 fire ball like orbs traveling from the direction of philadelphia

content.detailedDescription: I have taken my binoculars to see the stars and 1 moment after having started watching the stars, i have seen a light point travelling the sky and no bigger than a star and i have seen no drag behind the object.
content.summary: Taken my binoculars to see the stars and i have seen an light point that traveled over the sky

content.detailedDescription: Backyard.Seen three lights coming from southeast.They go over me and dissipated then two more came same direction did the same then one. weather was partly cloudy.
content.summary: From se.Then over me then lites went dim and gone.

content.detailedDescription: Oval
content.summary: Objeto ovalado flotando sobre un cerro de la cordillera del ybyturusu

content.detailedDescription: My cousin shot this footage of 3 lights in south london, he said came up from behind trees. he said he had seen them before so he was ready with the camera phone this time. he said he heard a weird noise that accompanied the lights and that they came up from behind the trees in a straight line formation then some blinked on and off before making a triangle formation then they blinked out randomly until one was left that shot off in various directions at high speed !
content.summary: Ufo / lights over south london
